Class GroovyCompassQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      src.java.org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.search.GroovyCompassQueryBuilder

class GroovyCompassQueryBuilder
extends groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport

A Groovy CompassQuery builder, taking nested closures and dynamic method invocation in the Groovy-builder style Note: Instances of this class are NOT thread-safe: you should create one for the duration of your CompassSession then discard it

author:
Maurice Nicholson

Nested Class Summary
class GroovyCompassQueryBuilder.CompassQueryBuildingClosureDelegate

This class acts as the query-builder closure delegate, identifying which method to call on which object and tying the result together at the end Note: Instances of this class are NOT thread-safe
